title: Ashita no Yukinojou (Tomorrow's Yukinojou)
synopsis: Kasuga Serina is a cheerful girl and enjoys her school life. One day, she meets a handsome transfer student, Yukimura Yukinojo, who acts as if he were indifferent of others. Despite his behavior, she cannot help caring about him.
staff: [['Kageyama, Shigenori', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Katou, Hiroto', ['Animation Director']], ['Tahara, Yuuko', ['Background Art']]]
